page.title: 04SHOPPING-DUNTON GREEN AREA
page.content: The main shopping areas in Dunton Green,Chipstead & Riverhead are a block of shops at D.G. and two fairly small parades in Riverhead. Chipstead has a general grocery store and a Post Office. The shops in D.G. are grocers,bakers,butchers,electrical, hairdressers & others. Riverhead has a wider selection. A survey of shoppers in Dunton Green showed that a few of them do their everyday shopping here but mostly they shop at the two supermarkets in Sevenoaks with more using Tesco than Waitrose. People mostly go out of D.G. to buy clothes & shoes, Sevenoaks, Bromley & Orpington being the main areas used. The shop most people miss in D.G. is a chemist.
